item.title: About
item.description: Serving the community with the knowledge, skills and values obtained during my education process. Also to get a broader view of what is being an Electronic Engineer at the workplace, maintaining a projection of the social values learned during my education.

item.title: Technical Sales Consultant
item.description: Full delivery for products for telecommunication devices project. Design the specifications, the project coordination and validation. Represents internally the customer to make sure that any delivery and communications are coherent with customer prime expectations.
Serving the community with the knowledge, skills and values learned during my life. Help to help, always do the right thing even if it is not perceived. enjoy life serving and helping.

item.title: Application Development
item.description: Different solutions to specific problems. Design solutions using java, python, c#, c++ or visual basic.

item.title: Digital Solutions and security
item.description: Life is happening at a very fast pace, and the need to learn new technologies and ways to solve is a necessity. I have never stopped learning and I love teaching, everything related to new technologies
